about_the_game:
STORY:

Meet Sebastian, a seasoned detective who found himself struggling against reality and bills. To make ends meet, he made a career shift, trading crime scenes for cubicles by joining a tech company as a software tester. From chasing criminals to hunting down bugs - looks like a logical transition.

But don't be fooled by the seemingly routine office life - there are hidden truths to be discovered! Company's bank account just got raided, so Seba must don his detective hat to get his salary back and solve this mysterious case.

As you investigate, you'll uncover the secret agendas of your colleagues and learn more about the dark side of the office life. Gather evidence, interview suspects, and piece together clues to solve this ironic corporate intrigue.

FEATURES:
  • Full voice acting: Engage with a cast of dynamic characters, each brought to life with full voice acting, making every interaction a memorable experience.
  • Comic Book Art: Dive into a visually charming world crafted in a black-and-white comic book style.
  • Dash of Irony: Embark on a hilarious journey filled with witty dialogues, humorous situations, and cleverly crafted puzzles.

content_descriptors.notes: There are visual or text references to alcohol and tobacco use.

short_description: Ironic point & click adventure where a once brilliant detective quits his trade to test software and make a living. But even in the seemingly mundane world of office life, there are secrets to be uncovered. Navigate through puzzles, quirky colleagues, and intrigues to crack corporate mysteries.
